myfuel.GUIActions

Class CarFuelActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • myfuel.GUIActions.GUIActions
      • myfuel.GUIActions.CarFuelActions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FastFuelActions

    public class CarFuelActions
extends GUIActions
    Car Fuel GUI Controller, responsible for all logic functionality.
    Author:
    Maor

      • verifyDetails

        public boolean verifyDetails(java.lang.String amount,
                             int fuelSelected,
                             java.lang.String dName,
                             java.lang.String stationSelected,
                             int cid,
                             int nid,
                             int limit)
        Verify user input details.
        Parameters:
        amount - - Fuel Order amount.
        fuelSelected - - Fuel type selected.
        dName - - Driver name .
        stationSelected - - Station selected.
        cid - - Car ID Number.
        nid - - Network ID number.
        limit - - Limit type(0- Amount,1-Cash).
        Returns:
        true if all input details is correct and false otherwise.
